playn.core

Interface Mouse.LayerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mouse.LayerAdapter
    Enclosing interface:
    Mouse

    public static interface Mouse.LayerListener
    An interface for listening to mouse events that interact with a single layer. See Layer.addListener(Mouse.LayerListener).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMouseDown(Mouse.ButtonEvent event)
      Called when the mouse is pressed.
      void onMouseDrag(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
      Called when the mouse button is pressed on a layer and is subsequently moved (dragged).
      void onMouseMove(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
      Called when the mouse is moved and is not currently engaged in a drag (see onMouseDrag(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent).
      void onMouseOut(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
      Called when the mouse leaves a Layer.
      void onMouseOver(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
      Called when the mouse enters a Layer.
      void onMouseUp(Mouse.ButtonEvent event)
      Called when the mouse is released.
      void onMouseWheelScroll(Mouse.WheelEvent event)
      Called when mouse wheel scroll occurs while the mouse is hovered over the listening layer, or while the layer is active due to having been previously hit by a mouse click which has not yet been released.

    • Method Detail

      • onMouseDown

        void onMouseDown(Mouse.ButtonEvent event)
        Called when the mouse is pressed.
        Parameters:
        event - provides mouse position, button and other metadata.

      • onMouseUp

        void onMouseUp(Mouse.ButtonEvent event)
        Called when the mouse is released.
        Parameters:
        event - provides mouse position, button and other metadata.

      • onMouseDrag

        void onMouseDrag(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
        Called when the mouse button is pressed on a layer and is subsequently moved (dragged). This event is dispatched to the layer that was "hit" when the mouse button was first pressed.
        Parameters:
        event - provides mouse position and other metadata.

      • onMouseMove

        void onMouseMove(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
        Called when the mouse is moved and is not currently engaged in a drag (see onMouseDrag(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent). The event is dispatched to the layer which is intersected by the mouse coordinates.
        Parameters:
        event - provides mouse position and other metadata.

      • onMouseOver

        void onMouseOver(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
        Called when the mouse enters a Layer. Note: MotionEvent is first dispatched to onMouseDrag(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent) or onMouseMove(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent), then to onMouseOut(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent) and finally to onMouseOver(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent). These three events share a single preventDefault state.
        Parameters:
        event - provides mouse position and other metadata.

      • onMouseOut

        void onMouseOut(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
        Called when the mouse leaves a Layer. Note: MotionEvent is first dispatched to onMouseDrag(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent) or onMouseMove(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent), then to onMouseOut(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent) and finally to onMouseOver(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent). These three events share a single preventDefault state.
        Parameters:
        event - provides mouse position and other metadata.

      • onMouseWheelScroll

        void onMouseWheelScroll(Mouse.WheelEvent event)
        Called when mouse wheel scroll occurs while the mouse is hovered over the listening layer, or while the layer is active due to having been previously hit by a mouse click which has not yet been released.

        Negative velocity corresponds to scrolling north/up. Positive velocity corresponds to scrolling south/down. Each scroll 'click' is 1 velocity.

        Parameters:
        event - provides wheel velocity and other metadata.
